general.name: Name
general.donation_text: Your donation keeps the lunch.community alive!

orderset.subtitle_1: {{name}} is taking orders for {{location}} today. Click here for the
orderset.subtitle_2: If you'd like to have something from that place, put it into the text field below.
orderset.order_finished: Ordering has been closed. As soon as the food arrives,

create.welcome_subtitle_1: Get together with your colleagues for lunch.
create.welcome_subtitle_2: Never be hungry anymore. Never decide in long conversations what to eat today. Never eat alone again. Never get missed out for lunch.
create.create_community_subtitle_1: Here you can create the lunch community for your team or organization. You can share the

main.welcome_text_1: please select what you want to eat today. You can select more than one option.
main.welcome_text_2: If you decided to place the order and collect the food (or letting it deliver), please press
main.welcome_text_4: If not, just wait until someone else presses the button so you can hook up with them.
main.hint_1: Hint: You never have to reload this website and everything you click or write will be visible to the community right away
main.hint_2: without pressing the 'Enter' button (Exception: sending a chat message).
main.community_new: This community seems to be new.
main.invite_colleagues_1: Please invite your colleagues to this lunch community by clicking the share symbol
main.invite_colleagues_2: in the topbar. The link to this community will automatically be copied to your clipboard and contains a secret, unique ID to this community.
main.invite_colleagues_3: Please make sure that only people from your team or your local organization have this link to avoid
main.invite_colleagues_5: Please add new locations to your community to bring it alive. Press the '+' symbol to add new locations.

welcome.welcome_new_user: You are new here. Please enter your name so your colleagues know who you are.
welcome.hint_1: Hint: Your name is not stored on our servers but stored only in your browser. Your name is important
welcome.hint_2: to identify your orders. Usually your pre name is all that matters. But please be aware that your name
welcome.hint_3: must be unique within your community. It is also the identification of your person.
